website_summaries.verdict: The high-end Sony Xperia XZ treads familiar ground in phone design and hardware but places a strong focus on camera capabilities.
pros: 23-megapixel camera designed for improved low-light performance
cons: Not much different than the Xperia X Performance

customer_reviews.title: Great phone which freezes increasingly the longer yo7 use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in late 2016 and it lasted until now. After having several iPhones, I took the plunge to get an Android phone. It was great at first, sleek and fast. The camera quality was astounding. However, this didn’t last long. I found it increasingly difficult to take a photo or video without the app crashing down and not saving what I recorded. The past few months, the phone’s hardware itself started freezing and breaking down on me. Disappointing as other than the aforementioned annoying problems, the other apps worked fine and I liked the touch button on the side of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Miss R. Benn

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I only have this phone for less than a year. Purchased the phone in September 2017 and the nightmare began. I spend half a grand on this phone at the time and it gave the poorest performance. For over half a year the home/apps/control button do not work, then the phone freezes way too quick due to overheat - I cannot use 2 apps with GPS, that is, if I run with Strava, then I cannot play pokemon. Oh, it does not have access to my SD card, although you can see the SD card is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: XZ excellent phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Very prompt delivery , although in a sealed box there were no headphones, e-mail to seller and promptly a set were on the doormat, thank you ,the feel and operation are excellent,it has a different way to put program icons on the home screen but got there, I am pleased with the camera ( 2 photos Included), Downside is the battery life, my Z1 would last 2 days but this one a day. I would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: ... had this phone for a month now and absolutely love it. I bought it for a bargain price ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone for a month now and absolutely love it. I bought it for a bargain price on prime day from amazon warehouse saving just over £100 on todays price. Camera on it is excellent and all the apps i use run smoothly. I do prefer my Rumba earphones i bought on amazon to the sony ones that came with the phone so have put them away as spares.
customer_reviews.author: Von C

customer_reviews.title: It is the worst Sony I have ever bought, avoid!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been with Sony for theast six years, but after I wasted my money on this phone I will never buy Sony again, it is very slow and the battery with work for maximum 3 hours after a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Majd

customer_reviews.title: Just does the job
customer_reviews.text: Another refreshingly good product from Sony, with excellent quality camera and screen, which is one of my major factors in selecting a phone nowadays. Some very useful little elements, such as the 'slow charge' when the phone detects that it is being plugged in at night time. I would recommend finding a case of your choice very quickly, as I had a few nervous days before my protective case was selected and delivered.
customer_reviews.author: A Mair

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and service
customer_reviews.text: I brought this as my phone broke. This phone is a lower spec as my usual phone but it still takes great photos and easy to use. Very impressed as it was secondhand but looked like new. The service was amazing as it arrived earlier than expected and came well packaged. The only negative is that the charge doesn't last as long as my old xz2 phone.
customer_reviews.author: rollergirl

customer_reviews.title: It fails to protect the screen of the mobile phone.
customer_reviews.text: Being able to use your mobile phone with the cover closed is a great. However, the cover is meant to protect the screen but it does not. Drop the phone it lands screen down & the cover opens. No protection for the screen. Note to Sony, perhaps it needs a stronger magnetIc. I also purchased the cover in white. I am very disappointed that the my lovely white coloured cover started to turn yellow/brown within 12 months. I think caused by the heat generated by the mobile. A very disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Stay clear.
customer_reviews.text: Forest blue xz Supplied by dig n delve and fulfilled by Amazon. Phone was in as new condition but did not include a charger. Was not factory unlocked as advertised but was unlocked from Vodafone and still has the Vodafone start app which won't delete. Wife needed a phone desperately otherwise it would definitely have been returned. Still working fine after a couple of days but gets a little warm with use and wife reports that the battery doesn't last as long as her old z5.
customer_reviews.author: R.F.EVERSON

customer_reviews.title: This was a replacement for the Black version but it ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the Black version but it came with no charger, no headphones and no instructions whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good but battery life is is not that great. The phone turned up early
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: They are what they say they are but not t he strongest I have bought before
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm!!
customer_reviews.text: Although good service unfortunately the charging port was broken rendering the phone useless. Returns policy and the speed of which the money was returned to my account was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A decent phone but battery life is horrible under normal use
customer_reviews.text: A decent phone but battery life is horrible under normal use. Buy an external charger if you don't want to be caught short.
customer_reviews.author: MTE

customer_reviews.title: Battery n lead are rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Battery on this phone is horrendous the lead it came with was faulty
customer_reviews.author: 1992chloe

customer_reviews.title: Widex compatible
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with all aspects of this new phone picked from the WIDEX list of approved mobiles for compatibility with hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have charge the phone everyday. Only stays nearly charged if I don't use it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dean Rhule

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy any products from this supplier
customer_reviews.text: Totally rubbish phone won’t hold charge and the response from seller and amazon Isn’t much use so left with a faulty product that doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Really like this make and model, especially the camera. Purchased at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Joy's Joyful music 🎶

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Not tried the face recognition, but overall very happy with the quality of the product
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone / water cleanable
customer_reviews.text: Sony always has such nice, classy technology and this phone will not disappoint for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rez321

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, I had it working fine for 5 years!!
customer_reviews.author: Nayara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. I already use 2 weeks without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: mariia

customer_reviews.title: XZ
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, lovely design. Ideal if you are into your music, Sony have a Bluetooth codec called LDAC which is 3 times better than standard Bluetooth and if you use Sony's Bluetooth headphones that support this code (such as the MDR1000X) you will be amazed with the audio quality. Phone is fast, responsive and improved camera
customer_reviews.author: Shotguncarver

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I am on my 4th Xperia and this is a mediocre device compared to the previous generations. It seems slow to open apps and/or tools. It crashes more often than any other android device I have owned. It is fully updated, has been factory reset and had troublesome apps deleted. Not impressed and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Good servicr
customer_reviews.text: First one purchased kept freezing and apps kept opening on there own but replaced very quickly good service thank you
customer_reviews.author: jcain

customer_reviews.title: Great to start with
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone to replace a broken Z5 compact. At first the phone was really good. The screen quality was brilliant and the phone felt like a really great quality item. The camera was really good as well. However after only a few weeks I sent it back as the battery life was so bad it could get through a day with only mild use of the phone. Also the android version it was running was very buggy but that might be fixed now as a new version had just come out when I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I found it great, excellent smart phone, value of money. Beautiful features, head phones and fantastic camera. The main problem I get relates to overheating of device and camera.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: quality is good only sceptical about the plastic sides other than its ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for a xperia m2 and it is truly was worth it, quality is good only sceptical about the plastic sides other than its just a qaulity product from sony, would defintely recommend to buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unusable with long battery life...
customer_reviews.text: The phone has a tendancy to crash, lag and just generally be slow. If you are looking to upgrade your Z5 or Z3, they outperform this one by absolutely miles. The only saving grace of this phone is my battery will last for 2-3+ days between charges. This might just be because it crashes so much I use it less...
customer_reviews.author: Ellisse

customer_reviews.title: Loving my xperia xz
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone, as a Sony fan, this is my first top of the line cellphone and I am so proud of it, it works great, I am in Canada and I do not have any problem.
customer_reviews.author: juan carlos valderrama henao

customer_reviews.title: Had nothing but problems with it, will not buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Had nothing but problems with it, will not buy a Sony ever again, never known a phone that I can't hang up on a phone call because it's on a blank screen, messages keeps freezing up, battery goes quick and I've only bought this phone April avoid this phone at all cost
customer_reviews.author: Steven Barker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far the phone is great, my husband is really pleased with it. The brightness is very good and the pictures good quality.
customer_reviews.author: mira

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i had the phone for 2 weeks, and just stop working!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Andres Sampedro Sampedro

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal, Amazing Device and Services!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing device, very high-tech performances. Perfect delivery timing. It arrived one day before deadline.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre...
customer_reviews.text: A big mistake! Switching to Android and using SONY as my first android phone. The first couple of months were marvelous, but as more contents(Apps/Photos & Videos) were added to the phone, the more it glitches. The camera​ is definitely not the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Amaree

customer_reviews.title: So I returned them I was just disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Came with no seal on the box. And the speaker are so soft ,replacement one was the same. So I returned them I was just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bayram

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, fast at processing lots of data
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, fast at processing lots of data, can take awesome photos which are very clear even in very dark locations, great focusing and the front camera for selfies Is one of the best I've seen so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this purchase, and arrived in quick time.
customer_reviews.author: MR G D'ALESSANDRO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice phone but would rather that windows phones were still being supported
customer_reviews.author: Kenvin W.

customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia XZ 5.2 inch 32 GB SIM-Free Smart...
customer_reviews.text: Here is what I originally wrote about this phone. "Very competent and capable phone - like most stuff from Sony" I spoke too soon however, because starting with that particular phone, I have nothing but trouble with my Sony phones and tablets ever since - particularly with overheating and slowing down to a crawl. By contrast, I have had a Huawei BTV tablet throughout that time which unlike my Sony stuff has performed absolutely flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: James Towers

customer_reviews.title: Amazing devices, top quality from Sony
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Top notch build quality. Extremely well designed. The screen is amazing, especially with X-Reality turned on. Definitely a recommended purchase, but had to return it due to new Xperias being release in two months
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice design, great display, the sound is also good. Cons: none really
customer_reviews.author: Michael James Burtenshaw

customer_reviews.title: I have loved Sony phones as they stand out from other competitors
customer_reviews.text: Quality phone. I have loved Sony phones as they stand out from other competitors. I bought this colour because it is classy and a bold colour. Every since the Xperia x8, I continue to like Sony flagships, not all but some.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone. Upgraded from my Xperia z2 and I must say this phone is a huge improvement. The build quality is solid and everything about it is just perfect. Already running Android nougat also :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: same as z5
customer_reviews.text: same as z5 really. shame i broke the screen on my z5
customer_reviews.author: andy d

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic handset. Everything about this 'phone is perfect. Screen, overall build quality and functionality especially. Could not recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: undercliffe

customer_reviews.title: Crap phone, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for 8 months and its been two months now that it's been acting up. Overheating and battery dies within 4 hours. I've been trying to find out how to contact the seller but there is no information, but I suppose that is Amazon's lack of due of care for their customers. I need someone to contact me ASAP because this is ridiculous! I want to r return this piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Zera

customer_reviews.title: Right on the spot.
customer_reviews.text: Another very good Sony example. Solid feel. Extremely fast. Nice to hold. Excellent functionality and connectivity with all the added plusses of Android and Google.
customer_reviews.author: timjeff

customer_reviews.title: The new Crown Jewel of Sony
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded from Xperia Z2 and I am an admirer of Sony Xperia series. Straight away, this phone has amazed me with its amazing front camera which packs a punch of vibrant colours and has a wider view than most of the phones out there. Do not judge the phone by its RAM, it can easily defeat the lieks of Samsung as it has minimum bloatware and is closest to stock Android experience.
customer_reviews.author: Divyansh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, very pleased. Replaces my older Xperia. Just one niggle: the automatic rules in the Do Not Disturb setting are in Italian - I can work out what they mean but strange as everything else is in English
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast pile of crap the same as all mobile phones so I would buy again 😁
customer_reviews.author: f1only

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best phone ever, almost too fast for me :)
customer_reviews.author: Ecowatt Lda

customer_reviews.title: Stylish but Connectivity Issues
customer_reviews.text: Phone is stylish and sleek. However two weeks of usage and I've noticed a consistent drop in network connectivity. All software is updated.
customer_reviews.author: Kamanja

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: Had a huge scratch on the back. Amazon did not state anything in the description about damage to the phone, just the box it came in. All in all, a great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Casey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone but Sony removed the FM radio which for me is a must have. Why Sony?
customer_reviews.author: Melku

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was not really happy it didn't come even with headphones and this disappointed me a lot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SONY IS A KIND OF BELIEF
customer_reviews.text: I just hope 3G RAM will not be used in flagship of Sony anymore. 4G RAM PLZ!
customer_reviews.author: qdaqd123

customer_reviews.title: so I don't recommend this phone
customer_reviews.text: my phone died after 2 weeks , was on the charger when I checked it was off and overheated. so I don't recommend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and the camera isnt as fast and good as the one on my I phone5
customer_reviews.text: in my opinion and having had an I phone5 for the last four year I am finding this a bit awkward to get used to, and the camera isnt as fast and good as the one on my I phone5. Also my laptop will not support the software required for the ZX. Maybe Vista is too old now. In my opinion I should have stuck with what I know.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is wonderful and the functions are great but the sound system is too quiet. Unless you are near the phone it is virtually impossible to hear any sounds coming from it, that is with music playing or even receiving a call. I have bought two of the same product and ended up with the same result. This has never happened to any of my other Sony phones I've previously. To say I am unsatisfied is quite an understatement as I would expect better from Sony!!!
customer_reviews.author: yu wing fung - chiu keung fung

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't live up to reviews online
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge Sony fan and one thing I love about them is the camera. The phone was perfect and the camera is amazing BUT not when you zoom in. It couldn't even register the face of a portrait when you zoomed in (the distance of the portrait being under 2 metres)... So I returned it for a galaxy S7 edge
customer_reviews.author: Zamin K.

customer_reviews.title: ... EE and get 4 g calling as I have poor signal in my workshop
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to use on EE and get 4 g calling as I have poor signal in my workshop. It is not enables for 4g calling!! so frustrating and EE cant help
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great if you only want it for a few months
customer_reviews.text: At first, I absolutely loved this phone. Best phone ever. But just before it hit the anniversary of me having it for 1 year, it all went quickly spiralling downhill. It feels like an ancient phone now but I only got it last June. Its slow, it overheats, it crashes its so temperamental now after just one year. I've factory reset it several times which only helps for a day or so and really it should have lasted much longer than this considering how much it cost me.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: ... by amazon because it was supposed to be Very Good but arrived without cables
customer_reviews.text: deluded by amazon because it was supposed to be Very Good but arrived without cables, earphones, the screen with a good size scratch on. Despite i got a partial refund from amazon, the value is still less then the amount paid. sadly I had to keep it because I was in emergency. The phone itself has the usual Sony problem: very good audio for music but too low volume when phoning.
customer_reviews.author: TeK Nik

customer_reviews.title: ok but falls really short in camera quality.
customer_reviews.text: Happy about: - reasonably good battery life. - frequent software update. - good sound quality. - smooth interface. Very disappointed about: - poor camera quality. It could be great then ruined by: 1. image distortion, search xperia xz premium image distortion. unfortunately, the same issue happens to XZ 2. image blur, i.e. the left side of the picture is blurry and the right side is clear. This issue was there in Z5 and they still haven't fixed it in XZ.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan

customer_reviews.title: New phone!?! Mislead.
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly brand new phone, spotless and immaculate, arrived within one day also, after a few weeks use, no flaws present, will update review if anything changes, very happily surprised. Edit. After one year and a month or so use phone began to come apart and overheat just from regular use of the video, contacted the company and was told "sorry that our guarantee only runs to one year and due to it being over a few months they wouldn't be able to replace it no matter how many times I asked or how kind I asked they refused , unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Peace

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but hangs
customer_reviews.text: It is a solid device with some very good features. Sony seem to keep the device reasonably up to date with the latest versions of android and security fixes ( much better than other top-end phone manufacturers ) .... But .. I do seem to get an awful lot of 'stalls and hangs' that require me to reboot the phone. Such a shame, it is so near but not quite good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Minor7th

customer_reviews.title: A used phone with a warranty and a strong performance
customer_reviews.text: This did take some time to set up and kill all the extra provider apps. But once that was done the phone works a breeze, at least so far. And it has tremendous performance at around 150k antutu v7. Battery life is acceptable and AccuBattery places capacity at 90% of design, which is normal (maybe even normal for a new phone and this one is used).
customer_reviews.author: Mikhail Ramendik

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish phone! Always overheating when video recording. A phone update deleted all my photos and apps. Customer service was rubbish they didn't care. I got rid off the sony and bought a Huawei phone which is 100% better. I won't buy a Sony Xperia every again
customer_reviews.author: toecaps

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed....
customer_reviews.text: I have been impressed with the camera and the battery life! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrose A.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone and I'm really happy with it. Box was delivered with one of the VOID stickers opened though. All parts still in the box and the phone still brand new. Also delivered a day earlier than advised which was great.
customer_reviews.author: Vicci

customer_reviews.title: Mobile handset
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, however I own a similar Sony phone different model, yet Sony phones are brilliant one of the best on the market, and great value
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Another solid Sony product
customer_reviews.text: Phone is very good and has not disappointed me with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything spot on apart from instructions there were x amount of languages no English
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Xperia xz
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone and a fast delivery service, excellent all round
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst phones I have had. I have had it a year and a half now but going to live with it until the 2 year mark. It is slow, it overheats, it freezes a lot. Battery is awful. I can't think of anything to recommend it. I have to use a junk cleaning app to clear the junk, free ram and close programs about 3 times a day as well as restarting it. Oh and I have factory reinstalled it several times. I had an e Xperia z3 prior to this which was far better but it got smashed. Will never buy a Sony again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Having used this phone for quite a while now it's safe to say I'm really happy with it. I have had a lot of phones and the only other smartphone I was this happy with was an LG which died a month after warranty.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Z3. It's much quicker and responsive. Love the fingerprint recognition. Makes it easy to unlock and therefore loading camera is much quicker. Also takes you to the screen you were last using. Only complaint is that the charger which is now a c type meaning that you need to invest in new kit. However, you can get adaptors.
customer_reviews.author: Madnanny

customer_reviews.title: Golden phone last year.
customer_reviews.text: Sony always has the best designs and products. Love this phone. This is my daily driver now.
customer_reviews.author: ufo65

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone, no faults so far, just upgrade to android 7.0.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone beautiful, fast, and looks smart delivery was fast. well packaged and was at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex lawson

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly (on a Sunday) and I really like the phone. My fourth Xperia.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kirby

customer_reviews.title: It's a great upgrade from the Sony Xperia Z3 compact.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great upgrade from the Sony Xperia Z3 compact.
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn & Marcus

customer_reviews.title: I find myself horribly disappointed. The phone itself it good
customer_reviews.text: After doing loads on research, I find myself horribly disappointed. The phone itself it good, but the camera, oh my gosh. I've been getting better results with a £80 Xiaomi 4c. Photos look good, but as soon as you zoom in to get any sort of close up, it just looks like a poor water colour filter. I honestly expected better from a Sony product. Then there are the head phones that stopped working with my phone after a week. They work on my laptop, but I get nothing when I used them with my phone. Maybe I bought a dud, but I'm travelling now and so can't send it back. Gutted.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company
customer_reviews.text: Amazing phone props to the company for a fantastic and speedy delivery. I greatly appreciate that!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Beckles

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: There are already many reviews available on the internet for this phone so there is no need to go into detail. However, I am very pleased with the phone and so far, it has been every bit as good as I hoped and expected. It arrived well packaged and earlier than the forecast delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: umbugnet

customer_reviews.title: Simple Understated Excellence.
customer_reviews.text: So after much deliberation and having got bored of waiting I took the plunge and bought the XZ. It's brilliant. Ignore the iPhone lovers and Samsung groupies moaning about picture quality, for this price this is THE BEST phone on the market. Will add more when I get a minute.
customer_reviews.author: ababyotter

customer_reviews.title: The best phone around!
customer_reviews.text: Worth waiting for (and I'm fussy with technology products). An improvement on the excellent Xperia Z3. Sound, camera and screen quality are truly amazing (puts my Iphone 6 to shame). Early days yet as we've had this for some weeks but indications are that this is one of the best phones around. The Forest blue colour phone looks classy as well. Some limited cases around but we tried a clear one as it shows the colour and it looks great. Bose SoundSport (for Android devices) in-ear headphones work with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Great phone from Sony.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone from Sony. Great screen, and fully waterproof is a great bonus! took about 2 hours to download and install all the updates, but once up and running, a cracking phone that meets all my needs. I love Sony's take on Android. I've not experienced any lag in software whatsoever. yeah the bezels are big, but they don't bother me in the slightest. i would happily recommend this anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. A. Borro

customer_reviews.title: Phone looks nice although it is really thick
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately Ive had to return it. Phone looks nice although it is really thick. Software have plenty of bugs, ringtones are very silent, pictures quality made by XZ camera is really poor, notification bar is disappearing, updates wont install. Couldn't wait ages for updates to fix all the issues. I've changed to HTC10 and I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

product_meta.title: Sony Xperia XZ 5.2 inch 32 GB SIM-Free Smart Phone - Forest Blue
